about_the_game:
RPG game based on RPG maker mv ,the story is about ethan a young boy want to help people and he dreamed of joining organization called cleanrs to fight criminals and monsters hurting people join him in his journey to help the socities and making friends and geting stronger with every fight , the gameplay of the game is more than two hours,, I hope that you enjoy the game to the fullest,
the gameplay stroy: you will play with ethan(frist character) and you will go the cleaners orgnaization
in the normal town (frist town you respawn in)then the you can recrute second character night then you can
see the missions that you need to do on the wall (class b misiones) when you do it you can recrute the third
character jack ,then you may do class A misiones(you will find it in the book) then if you do it you may
recrute the fourth character emma and your rank will be S rank then you should search in the world for
monsters(there one in the castle) good luck
